price: 133. Hadduu doono, Wuu idin tagsiin, dadow, oo keeni kuwo kale. Allena wuu Kara inuu sidaa yeelo.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأۡتِ بِـَٔاخَرِينَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum ayyuhā al-nāsu wayati biākharīna wakāna al-lahu ʿalā dhālika qadīran
